docstring.long_description:
Requires a CONNECT_MSO2X block to create the connection.

Tested on MSO22 and MSO24.
docstring.short_description: Set the MSO2XX edge trigger settings.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_MSO2X block).

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The trigger threshold voltage, in V.

parameters.name: edge_coupling
parameters.description: The type of edge coupling to use for triggering.

parameters.name: edge_slope
parameters.description: The type of edge slope to use for triggering.

videos.title: Control Tektronix MSO Oscilloscope with Flojoy
